about_the_game:
Demo Description

In this demo, you can experience the early portion of a game fueled by humanity’s thirst for vengeance. Armed with a single weapon (a revolver), you will face simplified obstacles and progress up to the first boss battle.

This game is a retaliatory program created in preparation for the sudden extinction of humanity by an ultra-advanced alien civilization.

Warning: This game was not made for humans.

With language-free intuitive UI, it can be enjoyed anywhere in the galaxy. Wrapped in cute graphics, this game has only one true purpose - to drive aliens insane.

Why you should buy this game:

  • This game is humanity’s insurance against alien invasion

  • Even after our extinction, this game will torment aliens forever

  • Installing this game on your computer is an act of devotion to humankind

Player's Guide

  • Install this game on as many devices as possible

  • Place it on your desktop and at the top of your taskbar for maximum visibility

  • The difficulty level of this game is extremely high

But if you're a brave player who enjoys challenges? Share your game clear videos and screenshots on social media. Making this diabolical game look like an easy and fun casual game... that is your mission.

Have a peaceful day thinking about the aliens who will suffer from this game!

CLIMB UPWARD

In this game, which consists of one massive location, there is only one objective: To climb upward. There is no time limit. You can attempt infinitely as long as your patience allows. Keep climbing higher and higher. Reach the top, and victory is yours.

A SIMPLE GAME

There are no complex puzzles or profound stories. Those aren't necessary when aliens play! All tutorials and menu screens consist only of pictures. Even aliens who don't know human languages can easily navigate this game! The game controls consist only of running, jumping, and attacking! (Probably!)

DON'T FALL

Numerous obstacles and monsters will try to hinder your ascent. Don't fall. A single mistake cannot be undone.

BOSS RUSH

Massive enemies blocking your path are located at key points. These enemies must be defeated to proceed upward. If you fail and fall, you must try again.

LOW HP IS DANGEROUS

When your character has high HP, taking damage only pushes you back slightly, but when your HP is depleted, damage will send you flying far away!

name: Game for Aliens Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Core i3 8350k or AMD Ryzen3 3200G
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 (VRAM2GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX550 (VRAM2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: windows7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ Core i3 8350k or AMD Ryzen3 3200G
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 1030 (VRAM2GB) or AMD Radeon™ RX550 (VRAM2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: This game was made for aliens. This game must remain even after humanity's extinction. Please purchase and preserve this game according to the 'Player Guide' on the store page.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Greek, Dutch, Norwegian, Danish, Russian, Romanian, Vietnamese, Bulgarian, Swedish, Spanish - Latin America, Arabic, Ukrainian, Indonesian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Thai, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Finnish, Korean, Hungarian, Galician, Gujarati, K'iche', Nepali, Dari, Latvian, Luxembourgish, Lithuanian, Marathi, Maori, Macedonian, Malayalam, Malay, Maltese, Mongolian, Basque, Valencian, Bangla, Belarusian, Bosnian, Serbian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Scots, Slovak, Slovenian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Armenian, Assamese, Icelandic, Irish, Azerbaijani, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Estonian, Odia, Yoruba, Urdu, Uzbek, Welsh, Uyghur, Wolof, Igbo, Georgian, Zulu, Cherokee, Tswana, Kazakh, Catalan, Kannada, Quechua, Xhosa, Konkani, Croatian, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Kyrgyz, Tamil, Tajik, Tatar, Telugu, Turkmen, Tigrinya, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Persian, Filipino, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi
